```{r results='asis'}
#| echo: false
web_file <- list.files(path = "./web", pattern = "*.html", recursive = TRUE)
sprintf("<a href='web/%s'>%s</a>", web_file, gsub(".html", "", web_file)) |> cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
